responsibilities.title: Low-code Data Management System
responsibilities.details: This is significantly a self-made generic tool that can be use practically in any type of business operation that could empower users to manage data exploration and virtualization effectively. Fill with custom fields and data relationships, dynamic page contents & menu navigation, and custom modules / virtual tables that can all be dynamically managed with its admin application, with built-in user roles & rights and packed with API automation & documentation which can really demonstrates the ability to build flexible and scalable solutions that reduce development time and effort.

responsibilities.title: Central Site Management
responsibilities.details: This is a site administration tool to automate the full installation and other setup process for multi-tenant in a multi-client application in a "software as a service" runtime stack. This tool streamlined the configuration and database setup for new clients, significantly reducing manual effort and deployment time.

responsibilities.title: Data Table Generic Component
responsibilities.details: This component allows for rapid creation of tables with various built-in functionalities, including automation for API data sources, form input, column filtering & sorting, pagination, charts & graphs view, bulk data importing, and CRUD operations, streamlining the development process and promoting code reusability.

responsibilities.details: this includes new features request, design revision, custom post types, fields, themes & plugins development and support services from existing client‚Äôs websites.

responsibilities.title: Business Transformation System
responsibilities.details: this is defined as a change management platform with solution packages like Compliance Transformation Efficiency, Collaborative Risk Management, Task and Project Management, also features different modules for collaboration, SWOT analysis and a problem-solving process with incident reporting and data monitoring.

responsibilities.title: Central Site Management and Supporting System
responsibilities.details: the main task of this application is to auto setup a client's site upon subscription. It auto creates a new registered subdomain URL and a new database for the client. It also handles the data management and configuration of dynamic source code setup based on application version.

responsibilities.title: Billing & Collection Management System (by subscription process)
responsibilities.details: this is a customer management system which autogenerate monthly billings for clients and send through their emails, handle payments through stripe payment gateway and to monitor balance, payment and billing histories of every subscriber.
Mainly responsible for creation of REST APIs, managing database on creation of tables, views, triggers, user-defined functions and stored procedures.

Task to manage web hosting servers with CentOS 7, Apache 2.2, Nginx, PHP 5.6/7.x, SSL, MySQL 5.6, and later migrated to use Docker application containers to ensure portability and consistency across multiple environments from development to production.

I also created an advance generic html table jQuery plugin with built-in features such as inline adding and editing, column sorting and filters, data pagination, data formatter templating, export to word/excel/pdf and bulk import data management tool, Kanban views options for task management table feature, and custom interactive Gantt table view for project tracking and monitoring.

It generates reports such as payroll worksheet, paycard file for fund transfer, and other employee/government report requirements.

responsibilities.details: this is an html form used to send customer data or email notifications that is customized for each client's needs. In this webform customer data is auto populated during calls, while customer call disposition is entered by the agents and submitted directly to the client web url address (API) after each call. This also includes a data tracker for report compilation.

Also integrates with an account monitoring system for customer‚Äôs ledger and history of their bills, payments, meter readings, and outstanding balance.  This application also processes timely reports like payment collection, for disconnection report and collection efficiency.

responsibilities.details: as part of the project for centralized billing management, this application‚Äôs major function is to get or set data from the central database server to the remote offices and vice versa. Mainly for customer data downloading to uploading of water meter readings from their reading gadgets.

responsibilities.title: Web Based Data Reporting System
responsibilities.details: a web application for data reports exporting system and use particularly by client‚Äôs remote offices for their data retrieval, sample reports include ‚ÄúDaily Payment Collection‚Äù in calendar format, ‚ÄúCustomer Ledger & History‚Äù and ‚ÄúCollection Efficiency Reports‚Äù. Reports are exported in different formats: MS Word, Excel, & PDF File.

responsibilities.title: SMS Text Blasting System
responsibilities.details: a text messaging service used for notification of current bill and due date, water interruption advisory, and other announcements.  Also include an automated response system responding to keywords from customer‚Äôs SMS texting inquiry like ‚ÄúPIC<space>BILL<space><customer number>‚Äù, responded automatically with their basic charge, balance and last payment. Templates and keywords are bind to SQL Server and automatically feed data from their respective databases.

responsibilities.title: Purchase Order & Inventory System
responsibilities.details: an item management system which includes material request, purchasing, receiving, issuance, return, price history and a near zero level monitoring, also include pump and motor monitoring system for all the deepwells around their subdivisions.

responsibilities.title: Materials Requisition and Approval System
responsibilities.details: a web application that is part of the ‚ÄúPurchase Order & Inventory System‚Äù used by company‚Äôs remote offices and affiliates for material requisition and viewing of request status and issuance schedule.

This network also includes a firebox watchguard firewall for added security.

projects.name: Rust Cassandra Graph API
projects.description: A high-performance graph database API built with Rust, Axum, and Apache Cassandra. This project provides a RESTful API for managing graph data with nodes and edges, complete with interactive Swagger documentation.
highlights: Fast and Safe: Built with Rust and Axum for maximum performance and memory safety.
Scalable: Uses Apache Cassandra for horizontal scalability.
Graph Data Model: Support for nodes with properties and typed relationships (edges).
RESTful API: Clean HTTP endpoints for all graph operations.
Docker Support: Easy development setup with Docker Compose.
Health Monitoring: Built-in health check endpoints.
Error Handling: Comprehensive error handling with proper HTTP status codes.

projects.name: My Curriculum Vitae
projects.description: A landing page for a personal portfolio site, showcasing my skills, experiences, and projects.
highlights: Built with Astro, a modern static site generator that delivers lightning-fast performance and optimized SEO.
Implemented smooth animations and interactive elements using GSAP (GreenSock Animation Platform) for an engaging user experience.
Designed a responsive layout with Tailwind CSS, ensuring the website looks great on all devices.
